Hemet.Valle Vista, California: Valle Vista is a census-designated place (CDP) in Riverside County, California, United States and is located in the San Jacinto Valley. Some areas of Valle Vista are considered to be part of both unincorporated San Jacinto and Hemet but has yet to be incorporated. The population was 11,036 at the 2010 census, up from 8,356 at the 2000 census.
